channel.title: The Air Gear item on the front page.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Air Gear item on the front page."

item.title: Re: The Air Gear item on the front page.
item.content:encoded:
It was apparently modelled after the blades of a certain character from Air Gear. That's all I can tell you.

(Yes, those are basically really fancy and technologically advanced roller blades)

item.title: Re: The Air Gear item on the front page.
item.content:encoded: I haven't checked out Air Gear so I'm not sure what the name is for it in there, but the BvS name for the item is "Regalia" and it is a monster drop from the Storm Riders.

item.title: The Air Gear item on the front page.
item.content:encoded: The first item that they show on the front page is from Air Gear and I was wondering what it is called.
